posts.post_content:
I'm working on Cincinnati Team Sets from the T205, T207, and T206. Looking for 1-2 cards per month. Grade is not a concern, but will not accept paper loss. Send me a PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], with anything you have available

T206 list of also listed in the T206 BST page

February Search List:

T205:
Bob Bescher
Tom Downey
Dick Egan
Art Fromme
Harry Gasper
Ed Grant
Clark Griffith
Dick Hoblitzell (No Stats)
Dick Hoblitzell (Cin. After 2nd 1908)
Dick Hoblitzell (Name Incorrect)
Dick Hoblitzell (Name Correct)
Larry McLean
Mike Mitchell
George Suggs

T206:
